job.title: Site reliability Engineer
job.description: Preferred Qualifications DevOps Experience Public Cloud Experience (Microsoft Azure) Container Concepts (Docker) Orchestration (Kubernetes) Source Control (GitHub, Bitbucket, Azure Repos etc) Continuous Integration ( Azure Pipelines, Jenkins, Bamboo etc) Continuous Deployment (Azure DevOps, Jenkins etc) Experience with infrastructure automation tools (Terraform, Packer, Puppet, Ansible etc) Scripting Experience (Python, Ruby, Bash, Shell, Node.js) Security and Network awareness Product Mindset Learnability Self Motivated Experience in Agile methodologies Experience working with global teams Good communication & interpersonal skills Minimum Qualifications 5 years of IT industry experience with a Bachelor's/Master's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent Strong Software Engineering Principles Product Company Experience
